meanings: 음식의 맛에 관한 표현 You are a great cook.
음식의 맛에 관한 표현 You are a master chef.

vlive.korean: [나?] - 편의점의 달인? - 달인이요? [Me?] - Mater of convenience store? - Master? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.14
멤버들, 멤버들 하면 제가 진짜 달인이지 않을까요? That would be really difficult. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 러브들♥️
오늘 편의점의 달인 특집을 준비했는데 어떠셨나요? How did you feel about today's TO DO? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.14
vlive.english: How did you feel about today's TO DO?

vlive.korean: '생활의 달인'이라는... - 수염으로? 수염 붙이기로? He was on "Master on Living". - For putting beard? 듣기 View video BTS : RJRJ 알제알제
vlive.english: He was on "Master on Living". - For putting beard?

vlive.korean: [여기 왕깜찍 찰떡설명의 달인이 있어서 전화드렸는데요] 영화? [of explanation! Oh, he's also so cute!] Movie? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [ATEEZ] 👂고막주의!! 난리나는 에이티즈의 고요 속의 외침🗣 (ATEEZ’s Scream in Silence)
vlive.english: [of explanation! Oh, he's also so cute!] Movie?

examples.korean: He’s a dab hand at cooking spaghetti. 발음듣기 그는 스파게티 요리의 달인이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a dab hand at cooking spaghetti. 발음

examples.korean: He is a master of disguise. 발음듣기 그는 변장술의 달인이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He is a master of disguise. 발음

examples.korean: The comedian is a genius in self-parodic humor. 발음듣기 그 코미디언은 자기 풍자 유머의 달인이다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: The comedian is a genius in self-parodic humor. 발음

examples.korean: I’m the master at negotiating prices. 발음듣기 나는 가격 협상하는 데 달인이야. DARAKWON
examples.english: I’m the master at negotiating prices. 발음

examples.korean: I never knew he was so into cooking, he’s like the iron chef. 발음듣기 걔가 그렇게 요리에 관심이 많은지 몰랐어. 완전 요리의 달인 같아. DARAKWON
examples.english: I never knew he was so into cooking, he’s like the iron chef. 발음
